args.question: Question to display
args.correct_answer: The correct answer to the question
options: An array of options players can choose from.
You can include 'correct_answer' also. If not, it will be added
args.point_reward: number: points given for answering correctly
args.preserve_order: boolean: By default the options are put in random order. If you set this optional boolean to true, it will keep the order as you gave it.
